← BACK TO DOSSIER
CASE FILE #06e

THE CONFRONTATION

Date: 6/22/2020

"Ten years of believing you were dead. One second to decide if you're real. A lifetime to understand why you disappeared."

CLASSIFICATION: TOP SECRET
ACCESS LEVEL: SHADOW PROTOCOL PERSONNEL ONLY

Mission Summary

Alpha enters Dr. Kumar's secured office during height of building assault.

Dr. Kumar experiences shock, disbelief, and anger at seeing Alpha alive.

Weapon drawn as Dr. Kumar struggles to process emotional and tactical situation.

Alpha must rebuild trust instantaneously to ensure cooperation and escape.

Key Evidence

POV Swap

Multiple perspective views of confrontation from different emotional angles.

#perspective#emotion

Gun Standoff Transcript

Recorded dialogue during weapon confrontation and trust building.

#dialogue#confrontation

Certainty Meter

Visual representation of Dr. Kumar's emotional state during reunion.

#emotion#visualization

Mission Outcome

STATUS: TRUST REESTABLISHED
Alpha successfully rebuilds enough trust for cooperation despite emotional trauma.

Dr. Kumar processes Alpha's survival and reasons for disappearance.

Weapon standoff resolved through Alpha's ultimate vulnerability gesture.

Immediate tactical situation requires cooperation over emotional processing.

Foundation established for escape and future relationship rebuilding.
